about_the_game:
Architectural Adventure is a leisure exploration game, in which the player needs to throw a point in the map forward, by the player's protagonist in a variety of exotic giant buildings constantly travel adventure, some buildings have model ornaments to explore, some can only be observed in the outside, the building colorful variety of wind Ge has a sense of science fiction, set in a fantastic air world, players can experience villas, grasslands, factories, mazes, earth houses, high-rise buildings, circular ladders and other buildings, with a third person perspective to visit the sightseeing, the scene is full 3D, built-in large turntable games.

Adventure of different content, intertwined, midway can be archived at any time, single mode, the main line of the plot, endless: with your unique way to write the legend!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP / Windows Vista / Windows 7 / Windows 8 / Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 240 / Radeon HD 3200
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Stereo Sound
  • Additional Notes: not

short_description: Architectural Adventure is a game in which the player plays the leading role in a variety of exotic mega-buildings, constantly traveling and exploring. Players can experience villas, grasslands, factories, mazes, earth houses, tall buildings, circular staircases and other buildings.
